name: grobo
text: you see, ray's unhappy because he has been clipped

name: luckypyjamas
text: i thought it was a different mr. smuckles though

name: hateandwar
text: It was just a vasectomy.

name: stagnantdisplay
text: But he can still sport wood.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: HI-larious.

name: werthog42
text:
where is that window, anyway
and why are guys always doing stuff right outside of it

name: sabalpalm
text:
Now that you mention it...
And especially now in the days where everyone regardless of temperature has their air conditioner on, I guess only cats leave the window open. I know mine would.

name: dak
text: You have not lived in Achewood (Palo Alto), you don't really need AC out here.

name: doctorbeene
text:
I feel so ashamed that I'm unfamiliar with the wonderful climate of Achewood, as you so clearly are.

Kudos.

name: dueledge
text: I always thought it was like one of those holes people sometimes have in their houses like between the kitchen and the dinning room to pass plates through.

name: presterjohn
text: Those holes are in fact called 'pass-throughs.' Believe it or don't!

name: salvar
text: Well then what's a glory hole?

name: cracklewater
text:
Maybe Grandma knows?

Older folks are wise in the ways of the world.

name: pogo
text: The opening in a kiln for melting glass.

name: omnidope
text: A comment left by omnidope was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Spoon, waitwhat, aquamuffin, mountain, Siah)

name: saint
text:
"grood. i mean good . and great . great and good."
~Teen Girl Squad

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by glorify, instantkarma, trisha)

name: shutup_shutup
text:
Grood - Source, Teen Girl Squad #4, 9/15/2003
Grool - Source, Mean Girls, 4/30/2004

My mind is a little blown.

name: riotdejaneiro
text:
Hehe...you said "blown" while referring to movies about teen girls...hehe

Oh I get it, shut up

name: omnidope
text: A comment left by omnidope was marked as spam and excluded. omnidope: What a douche. (reported by Magb, Zem, heatbag)

name: mat4900
text: Roast Beef's erotic skit reminds of a love scene in a Shaft (from the cop movie) book i have by Ernest Tidyman...

name: cdl146
text: Dude, props for having Shaft in print. That is the epitome of badassery.

name: tonyhighwind
text: It's almost the epitome.  Nate Small tops it.

name: catachresis
text: I can't see the alt-texts on this new thing, but I'm pretty certain this one is "Beef lays some sass on his oldest friend". It is true because he does.

name: chaesar
text: Word, plus in panel 3 he's got the classic "daaaaaamn" eyes going on.

name: kkkknasty
text: I like to repeat this one to my wine friends.  Some just don't egt it.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Reading "a brown watermelon with nuts" really puts your life in a whole new frame.

I'm still fucking laughing as I'm typing this.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: A comment left by untilyouaresonude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tinhand, featurelessvoid, mat4900, Darthemed)

name: clembot
text: i like how beef thinks that the asian steppes produce expensive wine

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i'm surprised that ray's so quick to drop the g33ksp33k term 'teh sekksy' . maybe he got it from the walk the walk, talk the talk guide to the computer lifestyle .

name: ppccd
text: I don't even need to read this one anymore...Beef's facial expressions are funny enough.

name: brokeaccount
text: I don't even have to LOOK at it, man. I just have to think about it for a moment and I'm laughing like a loon. This might be the best non-storyline strip ever.

name: cousinted
text: How long had Beef been standing there anyway?

name: clever-nickname
text: lay on teh sekksy with a trowel.

name: serf
text: i really like how beef looks from the corner of the window. its like hes cowering which fits him.

name: cailetshadow
text:
Ray's face in panel 6!

He is going to turn around and pour the rest of that 85$ bottle of wine down the sink.

name: caneessay
text: Is this the only properly punctuated Beef dialog?

name: vreeeee
text: In the third and sixth panel the wine glass looks like Calvin from Calvin and Hobbes. I do not know why.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
oh man, I see that.
It's the triangular mouth.

name: phthoggos
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: tekende
text: Buzzy Gran?

name: spinynorman
text: It's from the one where he blows a big bubble and he turns his face inside out. Looks exactly like that.

name: soticoto
text:
Instant 5.

I want Beef to narrate my life.
Now.

name: tekende
text:
"Soticoto was a douchebag. But just not any douchebag. He was the douchbaggiest douchebag there ever was. He typed out an asinine, rude, xenophobic comment on Assetbar and read it over once more after posting it.

'Now that's what I'M talkin' 'bout,' he said."

name: fineoakstructure
text: Tekende does some sass on his oldest nemesis.

name: soticoto
text: I'm still convinced "sass" means "cuddle"... and that is something I don't wanna think about.

name: soticoto
text:
I said I want Beef to narrate my life, not "I want some prick with an inferiority complex to narrate my life".
Learn the difference.

name: woodenteeth
text: This is the first Strip I've rated 5 in ages. When beef gets utterly carried away with describing something I always lose my shit, surely this is unfiltered Onstad humour, his day to day bread and butter stuff.

name: velveteen
text: See that look on Beef's face in the last panel? Downright furtive .

name: invidious
text: I love how Beef's teh sekksy sounds like the intro to a brutal forced-fucking.

name: rykan
text: I am ordering this, and I am putting it on the wall of my wine shop, so help me bod.

name: wonelove
text:
Beef needs to join that wine tasting club.
Put everyone else to shame.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Part of me is curious why Beef's concept of "teh sekksy" involves a pit bull's sack. It's not a very big part, but it whispers incessantly every time I see this strip.

name: fineoakstructure
text: He was sassin' Ray.  He ain't serious.
